availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James E. Black (Crittenden County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Union County, Kentucky. Son of Nathan R Black and Mary R Black. Resident of Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, District 1, p. 214A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden, Marion (West Half), p. 407.
Find A Grave, "James E. Black (1842-1876)," Memorial #54349203, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/54349203 (accessed April 23, 2019).
